Entry.1:
S. Theau 

Had a very quiet birthday usuall flying dual and classes
Entry.2: Played Golf with Bedoss at Sporting Club in afternoon my handicap is 10. Went round in 43 for 9 holes
Entry.4:
Went solo after 9 h 40 in dual with instructor. flew well as I have been fit to go off for some time. I was inclined to look for the chap in front after flying 480 hours with a pilot. Had absolute confidence in self but not so much in my engine.

At 400 ft engine cut out over rough country put up great fight for a clear patch missed by 10 ft crashed badly, machine total wreck, belt breaking round me. My most marvellous escape in the war.

Went up again immediately & got on well, confidence naturally varies, but I can beat such things with a small effort.

I am watched over by a guardian angel
Entry.5: Shaken up a good deal by my crash but am doing well now & have most of my confidence up
Entry.6: Went to Orchestra Symphony Concert at the Alhambra Theatre. Heard a most beautifull piece played. Dance des Heures by Ponchieli.
Entry.7: Getting on well. It is touch & go whether this place closes down before I finish, but I hope to just do it. Flying all I can.
Entry.10:
hours solo on Avios.

Cross country to Amourier

Found landings

Camera Gun

Formation
Entry.11:
Receive letter from mother about Uncle Willy’s death, a beautiful touching letter & a fine tribute to Uncle he had a great heart always giving, living up to his motto always.

Also letter from May G. very touching.

I am immensely anxious to be home at once, I am very anxious about the ones at Home.

Finlay crashes doing the falling leaf stunt, not hurt.
Entry.12:
No flying very stormy. Day in town with Beaton playing billiards. Home today felt Uncle Willy’s loss very much very sad.

To be launched on the Pup on Monday hope it is fine.
Entry.13: Launched on Sop. Pup. Got on well & like her easy moods.
Entry.14: Finish on Pup & graduate B. Did well & like her very much.
Entry.16:
Down with something rotten – temperature of 104 ° spitting blood & pains in . 

Got a scare.
Entry.18:
Maradi

Out & about, found marvel can’t move myself out, must not overdo it.

Decided to give up here & go home the Sydney.
Entry.19:
First flip on Nieuport. don’t like her much. good landing.

Still feel pretty wonky - want a thorough rest.
Entry.20: Golf at with Boston my card was 97.
Entry.21: Have done very well on Nieuport did 7 landings today all good. Graduated “C" today, so am now a “Scout pilot" & wear wings at last.
Entry.22:
Flew D.H.9 dual. Went to won £4.10 so make up some of losses which amounted to £14.

Don’t feel too bright worst luck wont thorough rest.
Entry.23:
Had a trip on Nile in a Feluea with & two others had good time flying two sorties sent .

Sgdn. goes on
Entry.25: Dinner at Shephard’s with Mjr. Addings, Beaton, Glass, & Champagne. Sqdn leaves on Sunday for Aust. & I leave with them.
Entry.27: Left 5 A.F.S. and reported to Sgdn. at Hantara. We embark on the
Entry.28:
at Hantara. 

Very good to see the old chaps again.
Entry.29:
Very cold day indeed.

Embarked on “Port Sydney" at Hontara. in 4 berth cabin with Finley, Genty & Tonkin, very comfortable. Food most excelent & not boaty smell
Entry.33:
Passed Aden

Having a lovely trip
Entry.34:
Case of small-pox on board.

Vaccinated.

Sea Lovely
Entry.35:
Church Parade

Very calm

Passed islands
Entry.36: Arrived at Colombo 5 p.m. entered port with the yellow flag flying. Disappointed at not going ashore. Cable from home very pleased. Lost £3 at let this be a warning useless waste of money.
Entry.37: Coaling & watering. Officer of the watch.
Entry.39:
Having a splendid time absolute rest no worry at all. splendid weather

Food equal to the very best hotel – exceptional men also fed excellently.
Entry.40:
Crossed the line.

Vaccinated again.

No fresh cases of small pox.

Skipping every day to keep fit. Hot but no opressive cool on deck.
Entry.41: How Abbots’ Napoleon immensely interesting a great man born 100 years before his true time.
Entry.42: Church Parade good sermon. Humanity, our social laws & all our high ideals which make the world as good as it is come from Christ.
Entry.44: Arrived at Fremantle at 4 am. Left at 5 p.m. Lukis, Lilly & Bloke disembark, received 3 letters & telegram from Home. sent telegrams.
Entry.48: Left at 12.5 p.m. after coaling. Peters & South left us.
Entry.49: Arrived Barnse’s Bay at 8.30 p.m. Arrived on shore at Quarantine Station.
